mapper.insert: insert into y_machine (id, machine_id, machine_name, machine_no, machine_ip, canteen_id, status, is_use, is_delete, description, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time, safetyone, safetytwo, safetythree) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update y_machine
machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_name = #{machineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_no = #{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_ip = #{machineIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetythree = #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update y_machine set machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_name = #{machineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_no = #{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_ip = #{machineIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetythree = #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, machine_id, machine_name, machine_no, machine_ip, status, is_use, canteen_id, description, create_time, create_user, update_user, update_time FROM y_machine WHERE is_delete = 1 AND is_use = 1
and machine_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND canteen_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{canteenId}),'%')
mapper.update: update y_machine set is_delete = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT is_use as isUse FROM y_machine WHERE is_delete = 1
and machine_no = #{machineNo}

SELECT machine_name as title FROM y_machine WHERE is_delete = 1
and machine_no = #{machineNo}
